meanings.definition: The act of logging off a computer or online account.
meanings.sent1: After finishing their work, they clicked on the logoffs to sign out.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to always do proper logoffs to protect your information.
meanings.sent3: The logoffs were like saying goodbye to the virtual world for the day.
meanings.sent4: The logoffs at the end of the day felt like closing a chapter.
meanings.sent5: His logoffs were always swift and efficient, like a well-oiled machine.

meanings.definition: The process of ending a session or connection.
meanings.sent1: The logoffs were necessary to ensure privacy and security.
meanings.sent2: Without proper logoffs, your data could be at risk.
meanings.sent3: The logoffs signaled the end of their online adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her logoffs were like closing the door on a conversation.
meanings.sent5: The logoffs were a clear signal that it was time to call it a day.

meanings.definition: A command or button used to exit a program or website.
meanings.sent1: Click on the logoffs to safely leave the website.
meanings.sent2: The logoffs were conveniently located at the top right corner.
meanings.sent3: He searched for the logoffs button to exit the game.
meanings.sent4: The logoffs were like a secret escape hatch from the program.
meanings.sent5: Pressing the logoffs felt like closing the door on a virtual room.
